mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue(id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address) values (#{clue.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.mPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.editTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.nextContactTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clue.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
mapper.select:
select clue.id,clue.fullname, clue.company, clue.phone, clue.mphone, dic1.value as source, user1.name as owner, dic2.value as state from tbl_clue clue join tbl_dic_value dic1 on dic1.id = clue.source join tbl_user user1 on user1.id = clue.owner join tbl_dic_value dic2 on dic2.id = clue.state
clue.fullName like concat('%',#{map.fullName},'%')
clue.company like concat('%',#{map.company},'%')
clue.phone like concat('%',#{map.phone},'%')
clue.source = #{map.source}
user1.name like concat('%',#{map.owner},'%')
clue.mPhone like concat('%',#{map.mPhone},'%')
clue.state = #{map.state}
order by clue.create_time
